SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[LeadCategorie] ( [LeadCategorie_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [LeadCategorie_Titolo] varchar(100) NULL , [LeadCategorie_Codice] varchar(100) NULL , [LeadCategorie_Default] bit NULL , [LeadCategorie_Ordine] int NULL , [LeadCategorie_UserInsert] int NULL , [LeadCategorie_UserUpdate] int NULL , [LeadCategorie_UserDelete] int NULL , [LeadCategorie_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [LeadCategorie_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [LeadCategorie_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [LeadCategorie_Attiva] bit NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[LeadCategorie] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_LeadCategorie PRIMARY KEY ([LeadCategorie_Ky])
